name: Cannon Fodder (itch)
description:
Cannon Fodder is a result of following a Wind Waker water tutorial in Unity, and then expanding on it in whatever way I could.

  • Aim and fire the cannon straight into the camera to complete each level!
  • Watch the cut-scenes enhance the narrative while the game-play drives it.
  • It's a bumpy, weird, and short experience
  • This is my first published game (thanks itch.io)!
